casebody.data:
Stephen A. PERRY, Administrator, General Services Administration, Appellant, v. HENSEL PHELPS CONSTRUCTION CO., Appellee. No. 01-1353. United States Court of Appeals, Federal Circuit. May 10, 2002.

Before MAYER, Chief Judge, MICHEL, and DYK, Circuit Judges.

Judgment

PER CURIAM.

This CAUSE having been heard and considered, it is ORDERED and ADJUDGED.

AFFIRMED. See Fed. Cir. R. 36.
